mapper.select: select lat, lng from lot where mno=#{value}

select sc.SCH_NUM, MAX(sc.SCH_CRE) as SCH_CRE, MAX(sc.SCH_TITLE) as SCH_TITLE, MAX(sc.CATE_CODE) as CATE_CODE, MAX(sc.NOTI_LIKES) as NOTI_LIKES, MAX(sc.NOTI_VIEWS) as NOTI_VIEWS, MAX(fi.FILE_NAME) as FILE_NAME, MAX(sc.PET_SPEC) as PET_SPEC, MAX(me.MEM_NUM) as MEM_NUM, MAX(me.MEM_NAME) as MEM_NAME from schedule sc left outer join files fi on sc.SCH_NUM = fi.SCH_NUM left outer join member me on sc.MEM_NUM = me.MEM_NUM where CATE_CODE='SANCHE' and NOTI_HIDE=1 group by sc.SCH_NUM order by sc.SCH_CRE desc limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
mapper.insert: insert into lot(lat, lng, mno) values(#{lat}, #{lng}, 3)
